Description_lang: Fires a jet of flame, burning all enemies in front of the caster within $62553a1 yards, dealing $62553s1 Fire damage every half-second for $62546d. Additionally, the ground is scorched by this effect causing it to catch on fire, dealing $62549s1 Fire damage every second to all enemies within $62549a1 yards. Iron Constructs within this radius will begin to heat up, eventually becoming molten.
